verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: For the second time in a week] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: urged] [ARG1: other countries] [ARG2: to support the North American bid to host the 2026 World Cup] .
For the second time in a week , President Donald Trump on Monday urged [ARG0: other countries] to [V: support] [ARG1: the North American bid to host the 2026 World Cup] .
For the second time in a week , President Donald Trump on Monday urged other countries to support the North American bid to [V: host] [ARG1: the 2026 World Cup] .
